Package me.dueris.canvas.logger

Interface Obfuscator

public interface Obfuscator

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    decodeBase64(String input)
    Decodes a message in a Base64 format
    String
    decrypt(String encryptedData, String key, String algorithm)
    EXAMPLE: String key = Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().generateEncryptionKey("AES"); String encryptedMsg = Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().encrypt("Hello world!", key, "AES"); Bukkit.getLogger().info(encryptedMsg); Bukkit.getLogger().info(Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().decrypt(encryptedMsg, key, "AES"));
    String
    encodeBase64(String input)
    Encodes a message in a Base64 format
    String
    encrypt(String data, String key, String algorithm)
    EXAMPLE: String key = Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().generateEncryptionKey("AES"); String encryptedMsg = Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().encrypt("Hello world!", key, "AES"); Bukkit.getLogger().info(encryptedMsg); Bukkit.getLogger().info(Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().decrypt(encryptedMsg, key, "AES"));
    void
    error(String msg)
    Logs a message with the log level of SEVERE
    String
    generateEncryptionKey(String algorithm)
    Generates an encryption key for encrypting data
    String
    genKey(int length)
    Generates a random key with a specified length
    void
    log(String msg)
    Logs a message with the log level of INFO
    void
    logMsg(Level logLevel, String msg)
    Logs a message with the log level of the provided Level
    String
    obfuscateMessage(String msg)
    Obfuscates a message using the Canvas obfuscator, turning the characters from the provided String to a randomized String, commonly used for encryption
    String
    obfuscateMessage(String msg, Map<Character,Character> characterMap)
    Creates obfuscated message using a special provided characterMap of Map<Character, Character>.
    void
    warn(String msg)
    Logs a message with the log level of WARNING

    • encrypt

      String encrypt(String data, String key, String algorithm)
      EXAMPLE: String key = Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().generateEncryptionKey("AES"); String encryptedMsg = Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().encrypt("Hello world!", key, "AES"); Bukkit.getLogger().info(encryptedMsg); Bukkit.getLogger().info(Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().decrypt(encryptedMsg, key, "AES"));
      Parameters:
      data -
      key -
      algorithm -
      Returns:
      Encrypted String with the encryption algorithm of your choosing.

    • decrypt

      String decrypt(String encryptedData, String key, String algorithm)
      EXAMPLE: String key = Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().generateEncryptionKey("AES"); String encryptedMsg = Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().encrypt("Hello world!", key, "AES"); Bukkit.getLogger().info(encryptedMsg); Bukkit.getLogger().info(Bukkit.getServer().getCanvasLogger().getObfuscator().decrypt(encryptedMsg, key, "AES"));
      Parameters:
      encryptedData -
      key -
      algorithm -
      Returns:
      Decrypted String with the encryption algorithm of your choosing.
      Throws:
      Exception
      BadPaddingException
